Bash(1984"\) for consistent page titles

Security:
- X-Frame-Options: DENY \(clickjacking protection\)
- X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
- Strict-Transport-Security with preload
- Referrer-Policy, Permissions-Policy, DNS-Prefetch
- global-error.tsx catches root layout crashes

Mobile:
- Collapsible sidebar with hamburger menu on mobile
- Fixed mobile header bar with logo
- Overlay backdrop, auto-close on navigation
- Body scroll lock when sidebar is open

User Settings \(/nastavitve\):
- Profile editing \(name\)
- Password change \(email auth only\)
- Account deletion with confirmation \(GDPR\)
- Account delete API with full data cleanup

Loading:
- Skeleton loading states for app and marketing route groups
